NK040(thi)005:1: // kah gcod kun dga' 'bum pa'i lus sbyin gdan thog
NK040(thi)005:2: gcig ma dang mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs dngos grub bang
NK040(thi)005:3: mdzod kyi gsal byed nor bu'i lde'u mig bzhugs so
NK040(thi)005:4: // na mo gu ru pra dz+ny+aa pa ra mi ta ye mang+ga sid+d+hi h'u /
NK040(thi)005:5: chos nyid ye gzhi skyon yon 'bri gang 'pho 'gyur yang bral nam mkha'i klong //
NK040(thi)005:6: lam snang 'khrul rtogs rab rib sprin kun rang rig rang gsal dri gzhon gyis //
NK040(thi)005:7: sku dang ye shes yon tan mtha' yas nub med 'od zer stong 'phro ba //
NK040(thi)005:8: bdag blo'i pad+ma'i ge sar rab bzhad bla ma dbyer med lab sgron 'dud //
NK040(thi)005:9: ma gcig ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i //
NK040(thi)005:10: zab gsang thugs kyi snying khu'i chos //
NK040(thi)005:11: 'khrul rtog dbyings su gcod pa'i thabs //
NK040(thi)005:12: gdan thog gcig ma'i gsal byed dbye //
NK040(thi)005:13: dbyings ye las dang 'jig rten gyi //
NK040(thi)005:14: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang chos skyong gis //
NK040(thi)005:15: gnang ba mdzod la mchog thun gyi //
NK040(thi)005:16: dngos grub gdan thog gcig stsol mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:17: de'ang ma gcig lab kyi sgron ma ni /
NK040(thi)005:18: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum
NK040(thi)005:19: chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma
NK040(thi)005:20: nyid mi yi zol du byon pa ste /
NK040(thi)005:22: nga yi bstan pa'i snyigs ma la //
NK040(thi)005:23: yum chen pha rol phyin ma yi //
NK040(thi)005:24: sprul pa lab sgron zhes bya 'byung //
NK040(thi)005:25: phrin las chos kyi dbyings la spyod //
NK040(thi)005:26: de dang 'brel ba gang yod pa //
NK040(thi)005:30: skye med snying po'i don la mkhas //
NK040(thi)005:33: ces gsungs pa'i dam chos bdud kyi gcod 'di ni chos pa'i shan 'byed /
NK040(thi)005:36: dngos grub rnam gnyis 'byung ba'i nor bu lta bu
NK040(thi)005:37: 'di sangs rgyas thub pa chen po nas da lta'i
NK040(thi)005:38: bar byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa bar ma chad pa
NK040(thi)005:39: bka' brgyud don gyi gdams pa 'di la zab mo
NK040(thi)005:40: bdud kyi gcod ces grags te /
NK040(thi)005:41: phar phyin bdud las kyi skabs su /
NK040(thi)005:42: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gang la chags na bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o //
NK040(thi)005:43: ces dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la shes
NK040(thi)005:44: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid
NK040(thi)005:45: do // zhes pa'i don khong du chud de 'khrul rtog dbyings su gcod /
NK040(thi)005:48: mnyam pa nyid la la bzla ba ste /
NK040(thi)005:49: ma gcig gis re ba med pas sangs rgyas gcod //
NK040(thi)005:50: dogs pa med pas 'khor ba gcod //
NK040(thi)005:51: nyams nga med pas bdag 'dzin gcod //
NK040(thi)005:53: gcad bya med pas kun kyang gcod //
NK040(thi)005:55: kahthoga pa bya bral 'khrul zhig rang grol gyis //
NK040(thi)005:56: gcod ces bya ba'i sgra don gtan tshigs ni //
NK040(thi)005:57: gcad bya nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong yang //
NK040(thi)005:58: rtsa ba bdag 'dzin mkhan po 'di la thug /
NK040(thi)005:59: gcod byed ma bcos shes pa so ma yin //
NK040(thi)005:60: bdag 'dzin 'khri ba rtsad nas chod pas gcod //
NK040(thi)005:61: ces pa'i don mdo ru dril na gsum ste /
NK040(thi)005:63: gnyan sa ri khrod 'grim pa phyi yi gcod //
NK040(thi)005:64: phung po gzan du bskyur ba nang gi gcod //
NK040(thi)005:65: bdag 'dzin rtsad nas gcod pa gsang ba'i gcod //
NK040(thi)005:67: dang po nang bdag gi 'dzin pa ma chod na
NK040(thi)005:68: phyi gnyan sa chu mig brgya rtsa 'grim kyang lha
NK040(thi)005:69: 'dres rang srog rgol cing sngon chad 'khrul pa yang
NK040(thi)005:70: 'khrul gyi snon ma gyur nas nag po kha 'byams
NK040(thi)005:71: gcod log bdud kyi bstan pa 'gyur nyan che bas
NK040(thi)005:72: / bya bral 'khrul zhig rang grol gyis //
NK040(thi)005:73: yang gcig gson dang 'di skad zhu //
NK040(thi)005:74: phung po gces 'dzin gyi gnyan khrod 'jigs pa de //
NK040(thi)005:76: gnyan sa 'jig shing ya nga gcig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:77: sgyu lus zhen med kyi dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:78: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:79: 'dod yon lan tsh+wa chu bo'i mtsho 'gram na //
NK040(thi)005:80: 'dod sred gdung ba'i lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:81: gnyan sa 'jigs shing ya nga gcig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:82: zhen pa rang log dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:83: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:84: bdag 'dzin rgya brag dmar po'i log shed na //
NK040(thi)005:85: bdag bzung gdug pa'i lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:86: gnyan sa 'jig shing ya nga cig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:87: rang rig bdag med dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:88: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:89: phyogs ris dngos 'dzin gyi gnyan khrod 'jigs pa der //
NK040(thi)005:90: phyogs 'dzin zhen pa'i lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:91: gnyan sa 'jigs shing ya nga cig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:92: phyogs med khyab gdal dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:93: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:94: tshe 'dir ltar snang du zhen pa'i gnyan khrod du //
NK040(thi)005:95: 'jig rten chos brgyad du zhen pa'i lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:96: gnyan sa 'jigs shing ya nga gcig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:97: sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:98: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:99: rjes snang sgyu ma lta bu'i dur khrod du //
NK040(thi)005:100: rjes shes phra rag lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:101: gnyan sa 'jigs shing ya nga gcig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:102: yang dag dran shes dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:103: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:104: 'khor 'das bde sdug gnyis kyi gnyen khrod der //
NK040(thi)005:105: bzang ngan re dog gi lha 'dre cho 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)005:106: gnyan sa 'jigs shing ya nga gcig de na gda' //
NK040(thi)005:107: rang gnas ye thog dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK040(thi)005:108: grogs po snyems gcod gcig mdzad na de na mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:110: des na dang po nang dang gsang ba'i gcod nyams su len pa la /
NK040(thi)005:111: ye shes sgyu ma'i gar mkhan rig 'dzin klong gsal snying pos /
NK040(thi)005:112: mdo ru bsdu na 'di lta ste //
NK040(thi)005:113: snang ba 'khrul pa tshar gcod nas //
NK040(thi)005:114: zhen med ri khrod 'grims dang gcig /
NK040(thi)005:115: sgyu lus gces 'dzin tshar gcod nas //
NK040(thi)005:116: zhen med mchod sbyin byed dang gnyis //
NK040(thi)005:118: zhen med sgyu ma'i lam khyer gsum //
NK040(thi)005:119: nyams su len pa'i rtsa tshig go //
NK040(thi)005:121: dang po 'du 'dzi'i nyes dmigs dang dben pa'i yon
NK040(thi)005:122: tan la bsam nas ri dwags smas ma bzhin du
NK040(thi)005:123: bas mtha' nags 'dabs brag phug sogs su song nas
NK040(thi)005:124: dgra 'dul gnyen skyong gsog brun med par phyi 'jig
NK040(thi)005:125: rten gyi 'khri ba btsan thabs su gcod cing zhen
NK040(thi)005:126: med ri khrod du song nas /
NK040(thi)005:127: gcod khrid gsal ba'i sgron me las bshad pa bzhin blo ldog rnam pa bzhi dang /
NK040(thi)005:128: byams snying rje byang chub sems la blo sbyang ba gal shin tu che ba yin te /
NK040(thi)005:131: rnyed daka'i shes pas phyi bshol gcod //
NK040(thi)005:133: rim par bsam pas le lo gcod //
NK040(thi)005:134: chos kun ngang la bsu skyel spang //
NK040(thi)005:135: rag lus snang yul gzung rtog gcod //
NK040(thi)005:136: bzo bcos bral ba'i rang rig pas //
NK040(thi)005:137: nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gcod //
NK040(thi)005:138: rang rig rgyal por 'jug pa yis //
NK040(thi)005:139: bying rmug 'thib sogs ma rig gcod //
NK040(thi)005:140: zhen med bde gsal mi rtog pas //
NK040(thi)005:141: rtag chad mu bzhi'i gol sa gcod //
NK040(thi)005:142: lta sgom las su rung ba yis //
NK040(thi)005:143: re dog gnyis 'dzin shes pa gcod //
NK040(thi)005:144: tshad med bzhi dang byang sems kyis //
NK040(thi)005:145: srid dang zhi ba'i mtha' gnyis gcod //
NK040(thi)005:146: de lta'i man ngag lam khyer gyis //
NK040(thi)005:147: chos ma yin dang log rtog gcod //
NK040(thi)005:149: des phyi 'jig rten gyi 'khri ba btsan thabs su
NK040(thi)005:150: gcod cing zhen med ri khrod 'grims pa de song
NK040(thi)005:151: / gnyis pa nang gces 'dzin gyi shes pa btsan
NK040(thi)005:152: thabs su gcod cing zhen med mchod sbyin btang ba
NK040(thi)005:153: / la / tshogs bsags lus sbyin gyi rim pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:154: bskyed bzlas ting 'dzin gyi rim pa /
NK040(thi)005:155: nyams bskang tshogs 'khor gyi rim pa dang gsum las /
NK040(thi)005:156: de dag dkyus gcig nyams su len pa la /
NK040(thi)005:157: sbyor ba yo byad kyi nye ldog dang /
NK040(thi)005:158: dngos gzhi nyams len gyi rim pa gnyis las /
NK040(thi)005:159: dang po ring sbyor la mkho ba'i yo byad ni /
NK040(thi)005:160: dregs pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir //
NK040(thi)005:161: lder bzhi ma nyams gcan gzan lpags //
NK040(thi)005:162: lta ba yas 'bub cog pu dang //
NK040(thi)005:163: spyod pa mas 'dzeg kha t+aam ga /
NK040(thi)005:164: lha 'dre dbang sdud mchog chen rkang //
NK040(thi)005:165: snang ba zil gnon d+aa ma ru //
NK040(thi)005:166: ma tshogs dbang sgyur dril g.yer dang //
NK040(thi)005:167: stag gzig ras ma skra'i cod pan //
NK040(thi)005:168: mdor na brtul zhugs spyod pa la //
NK040(thi)005:169: 'os pa'i chas rnams sta gon bya //
NK040(thi)005:170: ces rdzogs chen pa rang byung rdo rjes bshad pa ltar 'du bya ba la /
NK040(thi)005:171: de la gcod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis /
NK040(thi)005:172: chas la 'os pa'i yo byad ni //
NK040(thi)005:173: sbyin pa'i dra ba tshul khrims stan //
NK040(thi)005:174: bzod pa'i cog pu brtson 'grus dung //
NK040(thi)005:175: bsam gtan pus 'khyud shes rab ni //
NK040(thi)005:176: d+aa ru'i rnam par bzhag pa'o //
NK040(thi)005:178: rkang gling dang d+aa ru'i rnam dbye cung zad 'bri ba la //
NK040(thi)005:179: btsun pa sdom ldan skye bo ya rab dang //
NK040(thi)005:180: bud med mtshan ldan skyes pa grir shi'i rkang //
NK040(thi)005:181: bcu drug nas ni drug cu tshun gyi rkang //
NK040(thi)005:182: gzhan gyi 'gom yug ma phog ma nyams pa //
NK040(thi)005:183: mgo mjug tshig mgo gnyis dang bcas pa ste //
NK040(thi)005:184: se ba rus dang 'bur chung bar du bcad //
NK040(thi)005:185: rus 'bur gnyis su mtheb chen tsam re bru //
NK040(thi)005:186: ring zhing cung zad gug pa sna 'dra //
NK040(thi)005:187: sra la phra zing hril po rgang thur 'dra //
NK040(thi)005:188: lha mgo mi chung seng+ge'i sna dang 'dra //
NK040(thi)005:189: nang gi rus gting grim zhing ma 'khyog par //
NK040(thi)005:190: mdog ni dkar po rab yin smug kyang rung //
NK040(thi)005:191: de 'dra'i rkang g.yas dpa' bo'i 'bod rdzas te //
NK040(thi)005:192: g.yon pa dag ni dpa' mo 'bod pa'i rdzas //
NK040(thi)005:193: mkha' 'gro'i 'bod rdzas bud med mtshan ldan rkang //
NK040(thi)005:194: gri rkang dar ma dpa' bo 'bod pa'i rdzas //
NK040(thi)005:197: mchog chen mi rkang gling bu yin //
NK040(thi)005:198: brda don rtags gsum bshad kyis nyon //
NK040(thi)005:199: rtog med ro yi yan lag las //
NK040(thi)005:200: chags sdang med pa'i sems kyis breg /
NK040(thi)005:201: lha ba phyung zhing brad brdar byas //
NK040(thi)005:202: phyi nang gzung 'dzin spang ba'i brda //
NK040(thi)005:203: rkang gling kha sgo gcig pa ni //
NK040(thi)005:204: chos kun du ma ro gcig brda //
NK040(thi)005:205: rtsa ba mdzo sna zung 'brel can //
NK040(thi)005:206: chos skad zung 'jug gcig tu ston //
NK040(thi)005:207: gsham la 'breng lcags cod pan can //
NK040(thi)005:208: grub thob rjes su 'brang ba'i don //
NK040(thi)005:209: drang zhing stong pa gzhung mig can //
NK040(thi)005:210: mtha' la mi gnas dbu ma'i don //
NK040(thi)005:212: ro rkyang dbu ma yang dag 'dzud //
NK040(thi)005:213: thos pas lha 'dre'i yid rtsa khol //
NK040(thi)005:214: nyan pas rang snang gzhan snang 'gyur //
NK040(thi)005:215: dbang sdud dus lan gsum 'bud pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)005:216: dang pos thams cad nyon cig thos //
NK040(thi)005:218: gsum pas mdun du 'dus pa thos //
NK040(thi)005:219: gzhan la lan bzhi 'bud pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)005:220: dang pos snang ba zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)005:221: gnyis pas mgron rnams spyan 'dren byed //
NK040(thi)005:222: gsum pas pham rgyal med par bsngo //
NK040(thi)005:223: bzhi pas gzung 'dzin thad kar gcod //
NK040(thi)005:224: spyan 'dren la dzahmh'u bam hohs mtshon //
NK040(thi)005:225: le lo'i gnyid las sad pa'i phyir //
NK040(thi)005:226: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa lags //
NK040(thi)005:227: rkang gling ngan pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
NK040(thi)005:228: dme mug nal dang rab chad shan //
NK040(thi)005:229: lceb yug mdze pho mtshan ngan rkang //
NK040(thi)005:230: skya bo thal skya 'thug dang gsu //
NK040(thi)005:231: shad shad so dang ha kyang gug /
NK040(thi)005:232: gdong rus mi drang g.yas g.yon 'khyog /
NK040(thi)005:233: dum bur 'khyog dang thum por nyams //
NK040(thi)005:234: ha kyang sbom dang gas pa dang //
NK040(thi)005:235: lha mgo chad dang phrag sgang chad //
NK040(thi)005:236: leb leb po dang zur mang dang //
NK040(thi)005:238: lha mgo rwa lcags shing sbyar ba //
NK040(thi)005:240: bus na sgra log go gyur nas //
NK040(thi)005:241: yid mi dga' zhing gnod sems skye //
NK040(thi)005:242: yul de mi dge sna tshogs 'byung //
NK040(thi)005:243: de dag nam yang spang bar bya //
NK040(thi)005:244: shes rab d+aa ru'i mtshan nyid bshad //
NK040(thi)005:245: grags stong sgra sgrogs d+aa ma ru //
NK040(thi)005:246: dpa' bo thabs kyi glu len pa //
NK040(thi)005:247: rtsa gsum dam can 'du ba'i rten //
NK040(thi)005:248: d+aa ru shing las byas pa ni //
NK040(thi)005:249: bstan pa'i srog shing 'dzin pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:250: nang du stong pa 'dug pa ni //
NK040(thi)005:251: sems nyid ye nas stong ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:252: g.yas g.yon lpags pas g.yog pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:253: gnyis snang sgo chod 'gags pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:254: thod pa skam rlon bris pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:255: khrag 'thung drug cu'i bskor ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:257: chos sku ro gcig rtogs pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)005:258: dung gdan dkar po btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:259: dpa' bo dbang du 'du ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:261: gsang sngags chos 'khor bskor ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:262: dar tshon sna lnga btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:264: shi skra chun cig btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:265: mi rtags rgyud la bskor ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:266: gson skra chun gcig btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:267: rkyen ngan lam du slong ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:268: gcan gzan lpags pa btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:269: lha 'dre zil gyis gnon pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:271: khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:272: mgron them dkar po btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:273: mtho ris thar lam bsgrod pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:274: rin chen sna lnga btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:275: sku lnga'i dngos grub thob pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:276: snang gsal me long btags pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:277: snang srid chos skur shar ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:279: gnyan sa dur khrod 'grim pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)005:280: brda' dang po bla ma yi dam 'bul //
NK040(thi)005:282: gsum pa chos skyong srung mar 'bul //
NK040(thi)005:283: bzhi pa snang srid lha 'dre sogs //
NK040(thi)005:284: sgra 'di thos ma gyur sems can kun //
NK040(thi)005:285: don chos nyid rang sgra sgrogs gyur nas //
NK040(thi)005:291: ces rje drung bzhad pa rdo rje'i gsungs dang /
NK040(thi)005:292: kun mkhyen rang byung rdo rjes /
NK040(thi)005:293: d+aa ru la 'khor 'das lam gsum tshang //
NK040(thi)005:294: 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi nags khrod nas //
NK040(thi)005:295: myang 'das kyi sta re rnon po yis //
NK040(thi)005:296: gzung 'dzin lam gyi ljon shing bcad //
NK040(thi)005:297: man ngag bdun ldan gyi shing mkhan des //
NK040(thi)005:298: 'khor 'das rgyang gyes kyi d+aa ru bzos //
NK040(thi)005:299: gnyis snang 'ub chub kyi lpags pas g.yogs //
NK040(thi)005:300: snang stong zung 'jug gi sked ching btang //
NK040(thi)005:301: thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyug to can //
NK040(thi)005:302: mkha' 'gro bla chags kyi mgron tshom mdzes //
NK040(thi)005:303: ye shes lnga ldan gyi man tshar gdag /
NK040(thi)005:304: gson skras ma mo bran tu khol //
NK040(thi)005:305: shi skras mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud //
NK040(thi)005:306: snang ba zil gnon stag gzig ras //
NK040(thi)005:307: ma tshogs dbang 'gyur dril g.yel can //
NK040(thi)005:309: mthong bas snang srid rnam rtog 'gag /
NK040(thi)005:311: bcang pas ma tshogs mkha' 'gro nye //
NK040(thi)005:313: grags stong dbyer med rang sgra yis //
NK040(thi)005:315: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o //
NK040(thi)005:317: spyir gcod la rgyal ba don 'grub nas brgyud pa gtso bo mdo lugs dang /
NK040(thi)005:318: thod smyon bsam 'grub nas brgyud pa gtso bor sngags lugs dang /
NK040(thi)005:319: khu sgom chos seng nas brgyud pa mdo sngags zung 'jug dang /
NK040(thi)005:320: la 'dul rdo rje sgron ma nas brgyud pa gter ma zhes grags pa las /
NK040(thi)005:321: 'dir ni khu sgom nas brgyud pa mdo sngags zung 'jug ste /
NK040(thi)005:322: ma gcig gis phyis gcod log dar ba gsal byed rang byung rdo rje dang /
NK040(thi)005:323: pan+di ta don yod rdo rjes dbye gsal byed por
NK040(thi)005:324: rdo rje sgron mas bka' gnang lung bstan pa'i don
NK040(thi)005:325: yod rdo rje'i gsung gi rjes 'brang gcod log gi
NK040(thi)005:327: kahthoga pa lnga tsho kun dga' 'bum pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:328: bsod nams 'bum pa'i phyag bzhes deng gi bar zam
NK040(thi)005:329: ma chad pa'i brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes nyams su len
NK040(thi)005:330: pa la / dang po nye sbyor la sbyor ba
NK040(thi)005:331: yo byad kyi bcas bshams la dur khrod sogs gnas
NK040(thi)005:332: dben par stegs kyi khar rab sdul tshon /
NK040(thi)005:334: tha ma tshom bu ste rgyas 'bring gi lag len gzhung du gsal /
NK040(thi)005:335: 'dir bsdus pa tsam la many+dzu'i khar 'bru'i tshom bu lnga bkod /
NK040(thi)005:337: de steng bum pa rdzas so lnga bcas dbang gzhung ltar rgyab stegs kyi khar rtsa gsum spyi ltar /
NK040(thi)005:338: tshom bu'i mdun gdan zla gam gsum mam gcig gi
NK040(thi)005:339: steng zlum gtor ram stod zur gri gug dbyibs can
NK040(thi)005:347: bskang gtor bya na bang rim bzhi steng mkha' 'gro'i
NK040(thi)005:348: gtor ma la mchod rdzas sna tshogs dang gzugs 'gros
NK040(thi)005:349: sna tshogs par btab pas bskor ro //
NK040(thi)005:350: gcod kyi srung mar dmar gtor gnyis dkar gcig /
NK040(thi)005:351: rnam bdun bskor bshams dang phreng tshar /
NK040(thi)005:352: spro na gter gcod ltar btsan gtor mkhar thab steng nor bu sum tshugs /
NK040(thi)005:354: g.yon du bdud gtor g.yon dkyus /
NK040(thi)005:355: rgyab tu gshin rje zur gsum /
NK040(thi)005:356: mdun du ma mo zur gsum /
NK040(thi)005:357: 'khor gtor chung bdun bya dang sha sna snying gis brgyan /
NK040(thi)005:358: dza sprul rin po che'i zin las gsung /
NK040(thi)005:359: gang ltar yang rnam lnga sman raka gtor gsum sogs spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyis bskor /
NK040(thi)005:363: tshogs gtor rin chen spung pa /
NK040(thi)005:364: gdan zlum po'i steng nor bu lnga tshom ril bu mang pos bskor ba /
NK040(thi)005:365: yang na bam gzugs sha chang sogs zas snas bskor ba gcan gzan lpags pa'i steng shar lhor bkod /
NK040(thi)005:366: de nas rang gi mdun thod pa mtshan ldan sbrang chang a mri tas sbag pa kha kheb can /
NK040(thi)005:370: mi lpags ra thang lpags pas chog ces chags med rin po ches gsungs /
NK040(thi)005:375: las bum yang na dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar bkod /
NK040(thi)005:376: de nas stan bde bar ko lpags bting /
NK040(thi)005:377: gcod ma grol bar gdan mi bsgul /
NK040(thi)005:378: mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi sa steng khyab par mos
NK040(thi)005:379: nas zhag re la bskal pa re yin par mos
NK040(thi)005:380: nas dom ras thod par g.yog la dngos gzhi'i nyams
NK040(thi)005:382: de yang slob dpon nyams myong gi drod dang ldan
NK040(thi)005:383: pa las dbang bskur chos kyi sgo 'byed cing rgyud
NK040(thi)005:384: smin / khrid yig gsal sgron gyis nyams len gnad smin gyis grol ba'i thabs 'bad /
NK040(thi)005:385: dmigs 'bum mu tig phreng ba'i man ngag yid la 'dres par byas /
NK040(thi)005:386: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i mngon rtog che chung gi don
NK040(thi)005:387: la mi rmongs par rgyab brten lung bcas rdzogs pa'i
NK040(thi)005:388: gang zag gis / zab mo bdud kyi gcod 'di
NK040(thi)005:389: la 'jug pa'i dang po bdud ngos bzung nas de
NK040(thi)005:390: gcod pa'i thabs nges dgos pas /
NK040(thi)005:392: thog bcas bdud dang thog med bdud //
NK040(thi)005:393: dga' brod bdud dang snyems byed bdud //
NK040(thi)005:394: de'ang snyems byed bdud la thugs //
NK040(thi)005:395: thog bcas yul gyi 'khri ba bcad //
NK040(thi)005:396: thog med yid kyi 'khri ba bcad //
NK040(thi)005:397: dga' brod zhen pa'i 'khri ba bcad //
NK040(thi)005:398: snyems byed bdag gi 'khri ba bcad //
NK040(thi)005:400: dbang yul du gzugs sogs dngos su thags pa la /
NK040(thi)005:401: bzang ngan 'dzin nas chags sdang skye ba ni thog bcas kyi bdud do //
NK040(thi)005:402: dbang yul dngos su med rung /
NK040(thi)005:403: nang bzang ngan gyi rtog pa nyon mongs gang skyes thog med bdud /
NK040(thi)005:404: rang la bsnyen bkur dang nyams rmi ltas snyan grags
NK040(thi)005:405: longs spyod rgyas pa la dga' zhing brod pa ste
NK040(thi)005:406: nga rgyal skye ba dga' brod bdud /
NK040(thi)005:407: snyems byed ni bdud gong ma gsum gyi 'byung khung
NK040(thi)005:408: nga bdag gnyis 'dzin 'di lhan skyes kyi ma rig
NK040(thi)005:409: pa ste / de ga ji ltar gcod na /
NK040(thi)005:411: bdud rnams ma lus sems su bcad //
NK040(thi)005:412: sems ni skye med dbyings su grol //
NK040(thi)005:415: snang ba bden med sgyu ma la zhen med rang grol du bzhag pas /
NK040(thi)005:417: sems kyi rtsa ba chod gyur na //
NK040(thi)005:420: 'dod yon la yeng ba rnam g.yeng lha bu'i bdud /
NK040(thi)005:421: phung po na rgas phung po'i bdud /
NK040(thi)005:422: nyon mongs kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal nyon mongs bdud /
NK040(thi)005:423: lus srog 'bral ba 'chi bdag gi bdud /
NK040(thi)005:424: 'dod yon la zhen pa med pas dben par ro snyoms thog rdzis kyis /
NK040(thi)005:426: rig pa mkha' la spar te dbyings rig dbyer med
NK040(thi)005:427: gyur tshe skye 'chi bral ba 'chi bdag gi bdud
NK040(thi)005:428: gcod / lus sems bral nas sha khrag mchod sbyin byas pas /
NK040(thi)005:429: phung bdud dang nyon bdud gcod pa yin /
NK040(thi)005:430: da ni bdud de gcod par byed par lha 'dre dbang bsdud mchod sbyin byed pa la /
NK040(thi)005:431: dang po lha 'dre ngos bzung ba la rnam pa drug ste /
NK040(thi)005:433: ngo bo gnas tshul gyi lha 'dre /
NK040(thi)005:434: mthong snang sgro btags kyi lha 'dre /
NK040(thi)005:435: rang bzhin lhan skyes kyi lha 'dre /
NK040(thi)005:437: mthar thug don gyi lha 'dre dang drug go //
NK040(thi)005:438: dang po 'jig rten kun btags kyi lha 'dre ni /
NK040(thi)005:439: 'jig rten pas phan btags pa la lha /
NK040(thi)005:440: gnod bskyal ba la 'dre zer kyang /
NK040(thi)005:441: dgra gnyen nges med skad gcig re bzhin 'gyur ldog
NK040(thi)005:442: byed pa la nye ring chags sdang med dgos te
NK040(thi)005:443: gnyen gyis chos la phyi bshol byas nas sdug bsngal
NK040(thi)005:445: dgra yi log sgrub la bzod pas chos dang 'phrad na bde ba'i mchog la sbyor ba yin no //
NK040(thi)005:446: gnyis pa ngo bo gnas tshul la gzugs med kyi lha 'dre gnyis srid kyang /
NK040(thi)005:447: mchod pa'i lhas kyang phog thug gis gnod pa bskyal ba dang /
NK040(thi)005:448: bskrad bya'i 'dres kyang mthun pa'i grogs byed pa'i phyir /
NK040(thi)005:449: des na bden med sgyu ma'i rang bzhin chags sdang med par bya'o //
NK040(thi)005:450: gsum pa mthong snang sgro btags kyi lha 'dre ni /
NK040(thi)005:451: 'byung po'i rgyud rlom pa'i dpa' bo dang lha ma la chos skyong babs nas legs nyes smra ba /
NK040(thi)005:452: dus min 'ja' 'od me tog la lha yi dngos grub bzang po dang /
NK040(thi)005:453: dus min sbrul gcan gzan sogs mthong na 'dre yi
NK040(thi)005:454: cho 'phrul than zhes ngan par brtsi ba la sogs
NK040(thi)005:455: sgro btags kun la ched 'dzin med par sgyu ma'i
NK040(thi)005:457: bzhi pa rang bzhin lhan skyes kyi lha 'dre ni /
NK040(thi)005:458: rig pa las ye shes lnga ma rig pa las dug lnga rnams bzang ngan lha 'dre zer rung /
NK040(thi)005:459: ye thog med nas rang la lhan skyes gnas kyang
NK040(thi)005:460: don la rang ngo rang gi rig ma rig las
NK040(thi)005:461: gzhi med rtsa bral shes par bya'o //
NK040(thi)005:462: lnga pa 'gyur med las dbang gi lha 'dre ni las dkar nag /
NK040(thi)005:465: bde sdug 'gyur med bslu ba med pas spang blang
NK040(thi)005:466: mi 'khyol bar zab mo'i lam la 'dzin med kyi
NK040(thi)005:467: brtson par bya'o // drug pa mthar thug don gyi lha 'dre ni /
NK040(thi)005:468: sangs rgyas dang sems can mthar thug gi lha 'dre ste /
NK040(thi)005:469: sangs rgyas ni gtan gyi skyabs bslu ba med /
NK040(thi)005:470: sems can kun 'khor ba ngan song gtan tu 'khyams
NK040(thi)005:471: pa kun dkon mchog gsum la tshe rabs gtan gyi
NK040(thi)005:473: mkha' khyab kyi sems can kun sangs rgyas thob pa'i
NK040(thi)005:474: ched du 'khrul rtog nga bdag dbyings su gcod par
NK040(thi)005:475: ka dag ye grol chen po'i dbyings la yengs med
NK040(thi)005:476: gnas bzhin mchod sbyin la 'jug pa yin no //
NK040(thi)005:477: de nas tshogs bsags lus sbyin la 'jug pa la don brgyad yod pa las /
NK040(thi)005:479: sa rgyus med pa la zil gnon 'phen pa tshad med mdzod chen las /
NK040(thi)005:480: rang nyid khros ma nag mo'i thugs ka nas phatah gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)005:481: gnam lcags kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'phros pas
NK040(thi)005:482: sa phyogs der phog pa tsam gyis tsam gzhong gsig
NK040(thi)005:485: rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las dpa' bo dpa'
NK040(thi)005:486: mo'i gur khang de'i rgyab mi nag lag sbrel gyi
NK040(thi)005:487: gur khang / de'i rgyab mun pa'i gur khang bsgom /
NK040(thi)005:488: der gnas pa'i lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom /
NK040(thi)005:489: de nas sa mig btsal ba sogs ni gzhung dmigs 'bum las gsal bar 'dir ma spros so //
NK040(thi)005:490: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i mngon rtog che ba nas /
NK040(thi)005:491: bdud rtsi nang mchod byin rlabs /
NK040(thi)005:493: de nas mchod rdzas byin rlabs /
NK040(thi)005:495: d+aa ru'i mchod rol lan gsum bya'o //
NK040(thi)005:496: de nas dang po zil gnon dbang bsdud ni /
NK040(thi)005:498: dmar mo'i dbang bsdud nag mos zil gyis gnon /
NK040(thi)005:499: ces pas dang po dbang sdud ni /
NK040(thi)005:500: phatah gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)005:501: rang nyid rje btsun ma dmar mo zhal gcig phyag
NK040(thi)005:502: gnyis spyan gsum pa sku stod mi mngon dbyings su
NK040(thi)005:503: sleb pa / sku smad zhabs gnyis rlung ri nag po rdo rje rgya gram la brten pa /
NK040(thi)005:504: spyan gsum mi mngon nam mkha'i dbyings su gzigs pa spyan g.yas nyi ma /
NK040(thi)005:505: g.yon zla ba dbus ma khrag mtsho khol pa /
NK040(thi)005:506: phyag g.yas mi lpags g.yang gzhi dmar lhab lhab phyar ba /
NK040(thi)005:507: g.yon mi rkang gling bu tshag tshag 'bud pas khams gsum dbang du bsdus pa /
NK040(thi)005:508: srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa bar snang lha srin
NK040(thi)005:509: sde brgyad 'dar shig shig byed pa gcig tu gyur
NK040(thi)005:510: / lag g.yon mthil rkang gling kha brdab pa dang sbrag /
NK040(thi)005:511: phatah phatah phatah 'byung po nyams chung ba rnams ma 'jigs shig /
NK040(thi)005:516: gtso bo'i gdon chen bco brgyad /
NK040(thi)005:517: byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga /
NK040(thi)005:522: mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dma' na rag
NK040(thi)005:523: gi dmyal khams yan chad mtho ba nam mkha'i lha
NK040(thi)005:524: bran man chad / dma' ba sa 'og gi lto 'phye yan chad /
NK040(thi)005:525: dpe dkar rgyal po man chad /
NK040(thi)005:526: yul 'dres srin yan chad snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad tshur 'dus shig /
NK040(thi)005:529: khyad par du gnyan khrod 'di na gnas pa'i dkar po lha yi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)005:530: nag po bdud kyi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)005:531: dmar po btsan gyi khra bo gza' yi sde 'phen
NK040(thi)005:532: po gnyan phyug po klu rak+sha srin po pho mo
NK040(thi)005:533: ma ning gi sde tshan du gtogs pa'i lha 'dre
NK040(thi)005:537: khyad par du yang ch+gee'i phung po khams dang skye mched la dang po nad kyi sna 'dren pa /
NK040(thi)005:538: bar du nad kyi tshang bca' ba /
NK040(thi)005:539: tha mar nad mi phan par byed pa'i pho gdon 'byung po /
NK040(thi)005:551: kha yi dbugs phrog cing khog pa'i srog gcod par
NK040(thi)005:552: byed pa'i 'byung po bdud dang log par 'dren pa
NK040(thi)005:556: de ltar 'dus pa'i lha 'dre thams cad bdag la nyon cig /
NK040(thi)005:557: khyed rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur
NK040(thi)005:558: pa yin pas bdag gis khyed rnams la zab mo
NK040(thi)005:560: dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas /
NK040(thi)005:561: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god pa yin
NK040(thi)005:562: pas bdag gi yid dad gus dang ldan pas nyon
NK040(thi)005:563: la phrin las myur du bsgrub shig /
NK040(thi)005:564: bsdu na 'di nas lus sbyin la skyabs yul la 'jug /
NK040(thi)005:565: de nas d+aa dril bcas lha 'dre'i lam glu'i rtas /
NK040(thi)005:569: phatah spyir stong gsum gyi sogs /
NK040(thi)005:571: h'u h'u h'u phatah thams cad 'dus par bsam /
NK040(thi)005:572: phatah rang nyid dpa' bo go barje ba'i tshul gyis
NK040(thi)005:573: ma cig lab sgron sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig
NK040(thi)005:574: phyag gnyis spyan gsum mche ba bzhi gtsig pa /
NK040(thi)005:576: g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams pa gcig tu gyur /
NK040(thi)005:577: par bsam la ngag tu h'u bdun brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)005:578: rang gi thugs ka dang smin mtshams ba spu'i gseb
NK040(thi)005:579: nas khro chung rang 'dra ba grangs med par spros
NK040(thi)005:580: pas / lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang
NK040(thi)005:581: med de rang la phyag 'tshal zhing bka' nyan gsung
NK040(thi)005:583: phatah d+aa dril bcas sha za'i 'bod thung rtas /
NK040(thi)005:587: phatah phatah phatah rgyun du dmigs 'bum las gsal ltar de tsam gyis chog /
NK040(thi)005:588: cung zad rgyas par mos na dpa' bo go barje ba ltar nag mos dbang bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:589: dmar mos zil gnon bya ste /
NK040(thi)005:591: phatah rang tha mal du gnas pa'isogs /
NK040(thi)005:594: gtso bo gdon chen sogs sgrubs shig /
NK040(thi)005:595: khros ma'i dur khrod bskul pa /
NK040(thi)005:596: ma 'di nas nub kyi sogs zil gyis gnon /
NK040(thi)005:597: phatah phatah phatah dmar mos zil gnon ni /
NK040(thi)005:598: phatah rang nyid rje btsun ma dmar mo sogs gong gi dbang sdud ltar bskyed nas /
NK040(thi)005:599: 'dar shig shig byed pa gcig tu gyur /
NK040(thi)005:601: ma gcig jo mo sogs nas /
NK040(thi)005:604: bskul pa dgos min skabs bstun chog /
NK040(thi)005:605: gdon gnod tshab che ba rnams nang /
NK040(thi)005:607: de dag gi rgyab rten rnams phyi mar 'khod /
NK040(thi)005:608: de'i phyi la dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gur khang /
NK040(thi)005:610: de rgyab mi nag lag sbrel /
NK040(thi)005:611: de rgyab mun pa'i gur rnams kyis nang du tshud
NK040(thi)005:612: pas lha 'dre gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom
NK040(thi)005:619: brten sa dkon mchog gsum po gces /
NK040(thi)005:620: zhes pas skyabs yul gsal gdab pa ni /
NK040(thi)005:621: phatah skad cig gis mdun gyi nam sogs /
NK040(thi)005:623: phatah sogs nas yan lag bdun pa bcas /
NK040(thi)005:627: snang srid snying rjes skyong ba gces /
NK040(thi)005:629: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sogs /
NK040(thi)005:632: tshad med kyi snying rje rgyud la sbyong /
NK040(thi)005:634: sems can thams cad dus sogs /
NK040(thi)005:636: bzhi pa gsol ba btab pa'i yul tshogs zhing gsal ba ni /
NK040(thi)005:637: swa b+ha wa bdag dang dngos po sogs /
NK040(thi)005:638: bam hoh rkang gling d+aa dril bcas /
NK040(thi)005:645: mchod pa rgyas par phyi mchod so sor kha phral /
NK040(thi)005:648: bdag bde phul na tshogs rdzogs /
NK040(thi)005:649: gzhan sdug blangs na don che /
NK040(thi)005:651: dmigs pa med na mthar phyin /
NK040(thi)005:652: zhes pa 'di 'og ma kun la shes pa gal che ba yin /
NK040(thi)005:653: phatah phung po khrol gyis zhig sogs /
NK040(thi)005:660: sa gzhi spos chus byugs shing sogs /
NK040(thi)005:662: ma chos dbyings rnam dag sogs /
NK040(thi)005:664: byin brlab zhu ba bdud rtsi 'bebs sbyong 'di sdig
NK040(thi)005:665: sgrib sbyong ba la shin tu zab pas gsol 'debs
NK040(thi)005:667: rgyal ba don 'grub dgung lo bcu gnyis nas zhe
NK040(thi)005:668: gnyis bar rkun jag byas pa'i sgrib sbyang ma gcig
NK040(thi)005:669: gis zla ba gsum du bsgom bcug pas sgrib pa
NK040(thi)005:670: dag nas rtog pa 'khrungs pa'i lo rgyus bzhin no
NK040(thi)005:671: // spyi bo'i lha tshogs kyi sogs /
NK040(thi)005:672: sang sang dag par bsam nas ga te bgrang la dmigs pa bzung /
NK040(thi)005:676: nas rang dang lha 'dre kun gyi mgrin cig snying thag pa nas gsol ba 'debs par bsam la /
NK040(thi)005:677: gnas 'og minsogs rgyas pa mthar chags dang /
NK040(thi)005:679: yum chen shes rab phar phyin la gsol ba 'debs /
NK040(thi)005:680: tshig rkang rjes ma gnyis bzhag pas chog /
NK040(thi)005:681: de las cung zad bsdu na ma cig mtshams /
NK040(thi)005:682: gnas sham po gangs kyi ra ba nas //
NK040(thi)005:683: rje btsun zil gnon chen po gnas bkra shis glang lung gi dgon pa na //
NK040(thi)005:684: sras rgyal ba don 'grub gnas snyi mo khu yi ra ba na //
NK040(thi)005:685: khu sgom chos kyi seng+ge gnas rdo rje gur khang gzhal yas na //
NK040(thi)005:686: la 'dus rdo rje sgron gnas gar bzhugs chos kyi pho brang na //
NK040(thi)005:687: bka' babs bu chen bcu drug la /
NK040(thi)005:688: gnas rgyal khams phyogs med kyi dgon pa na //
NK040(thi)005:689: brgyud 'dzin brgya dang rtsa brgyad la gnas ri gang dpal gyi yang dgon na //
NK040(thi)005:690: pan chen don yod rdo rje la gnas stod lung mtshur phu'i dgon pa na //
NK040(thi)005:691: grub chen kar rabs rim byon la gnas kahthoga 'khor lo lnga ldan na //
NK040(thi)005:692: gdan rabs gcod brgyud rnams la gnas spyi gtsug sogs man chad 'dra /
NK040(thi)005:697: phatah ma cig brgyud pa'i sogs /
NK040(thi)005:699: lan chags 'jal ba'i dmigs pa gtso cher nad pa la /
NK040(thi)005:700: phatah bdag gzhan gyi sdig sgrib sogs nas /
NK040(thi)005:702: lnga pa bdud rtsi dkar 'gyed ni /
NK040(thi)005:704: tshad med kyi snying rje rgyud sbyang /
NK040(thi)005:705: gtad med kyi rig pa dbyings su bsre /
NK040(thi)005:706: bdag med kyi phung po gzan du skyur /
NK040(thi)005:707: spros med kyi ngang du lhan ner bzhag /
NK040(thi)005:709: gzhi bsres nam mkha' sgo 'byed gces /
NK040(thi)005:715: nad pa'i shes pa gsang ba /
NK040(thi)005:716: bla ma dang mched kyi shes pa thugs kar /
NK040(thi)005:717: de ma cig thugs dang bsre ba'o //
NK040(thi)005:718: de'ang rtog pa mtho na bdag gzhan dbyer med bsre /
NK040(thi)005:719: so sor 'pho ba rang la grib chung bas /
NK040(thi)005:729: phatah phatah lngas ma cig gi thugs kar bstim /
NK040(thi)005:732: de'i ngang la ci gnas bzhag /
NK040(thi)005:734: grim gyis bsgrim la rgyang gis 'phang //
NK040(thi)005:735: rgyang gis 'phang la phyal gyis zhog /
NK040(thi)005:736: re dog med pa'i ngang la gnas //
NK040(thi)005:737: mtha' bral gyi lta ba zil gyis non //
NK040(thi)005:738: mthar thug gi lta ba de la yod //
NK040(thi)005:740: gcod kyi nam mkha' sgo 'byed de //
NK040(thi)005:741: dbang bskur phal gyi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:743: bem rig phral la dbyings rig bsre //
NK040(thi)005:744: phung po gtub la tshogs su 'bul //
NK040(thi)005:745: de yang lan grangs mang du bya //
NK040(thi)005:747: skye med kyi ngang nas rtog pa sogs nas /
NK040(thi)005:750: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la /
NK040(thi)005:751: tshogs mchod dngos grub blang ba gces /
NK040(thi)005:753: mgron bzhi po sogs thob par bsam /
NK040(thi)005:754: drug pa dmar 'gyed kyi thog mar gsol 'debs /
NK040(thi)005:756: rang gi spyi gtsug tu sogs yum chen shes rab phar sogs /
NK040(thi)005:761: ma cig brgyud pa'i sku las sogs /
NK040(thi)005:762: byin brlabs 'bebs sbyang sngar ltar byas na legs /
NK040(thi)005:766: rang gzhan gyi ro de sogs /
NK040(thi)005:768: gang gi dbang bsdud tshan gsum po de 'dir 'don pa'i srol mchis /
NK040(thi)005:770: phatah mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chod /
NK040(thi)005:771: dma' na rag dmyal ba yan chad stong gsum 'jig
NK040(thi)005:772: rten khams kyi snang srid lha 'dre bka' lha ma
NK040(thi)005:773: srin sde brgyad / dkar po lha yi sde tshogs /
NK040(thi)005:788: be nag la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang /
NK040(thi)005:789: gzhan yang steng gdon gza' dang drang srong 'og gdon klu dang sa bdag /
NK040(thi)005:790: bar gdon gnyan dang the'u brang /
NK040(thi)005:791: byad ma lha srung bcas pa /
NK040(thi)005:792: za 'dre shi gshed dang bcas pa thams cad skad cig rang dbang med par 'dir 'dus shig /
NK040(thi)005:796: sha la dga' bas sha zo /
NK040(thi)005:798: rus la dga' bas rus pa mur /
NK040(thi)005:799: pags pa la dga' bas lpags pa gyon /
NK040(thi)005:800: phatah phatah phatah rkang gling d+aa dril drag tu 'khrol la sha za'i 'bod glu ring mos /
NK040(thi)005:804: bshas bshus ro la sleb pa gyis //
NK040(thi)005:805: sha bsgos rog la sleb par gyis //
NK040(thi)005:806: 'dre khyed rnams bdag gi pha ma yin //
NK040(thi)005:807: bu yi sha khrag rol du shog /
NK040(thi)005:808: khyod ni drin chen pha ma yin //
NK040(thi)005:809: da ran bzang len len du shog /
NK040(thi)005:810: sngon tshe lus la gces par bzung //
NK040(thi)005:812: da ni mi bzhag ston mor sbyin //
NK040(thi)005:813: mgron rigs srid rtse man chad dang //
NK040(thi)005:814: na raka dmyal khams yan chad la //
NK040(thi)005:815: gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma srin //
NK040(thi)005:817: mo bdud las kyi 'dre mo pho bdud rgyal 'gong srog bdag mo bdud 'dre mo srin mo 'dus //
NK040(thi)005:818: srid pa'i yul ni 'dree dgu gtsug lag khang gi
NK040(thi)005:819: gdon bcu byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga bgegs rigs
NK040(thi)005:820: stong phrag brgyad cu ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu
NK040(thi)005:822: spyi bo tshang bug man chad dang //
NK040(thi)005:823: rkang mthil sen mo yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)005:824: lus 'di'i phyi nang thams cad la //
NK040(thi)005:825: kho bo'i chags zhen mi byed do //
NK040(thi)005:826: sha zo khrag 'thung rus pa mur //
NK040(thi)005:827: mgo bo yan lag don snying khyer //
NK040(thi)005:828: thams cad bag phob tshim par rol //
NK040(thi)005:829: zhi ba gyis shig brlag par gyis //
NK040(thi)005:830: phung bar gyis shig rtsa ba chod //
NK040(thi)005:831: thul cig choms shig sa ma ya //
NK040(thi)005:832: phud lhag ma med par bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)005:833: phatahphatahphatah 'di bdag 'dzin rtsad nas gcod phyir pan+di ta
NK040(thi)005:834: jo bo rjes mdzad pa 'di kun gyis 'don srol
NK040(thi)005:836: dmar 'gyed 'di mdo phar phyin dang mthun bcom ldan 'das nya ro hi ta /
NK040(thi)005:838: stag mo lus sbyin ltar sbyin pa yin te /
NK040(thi)005:840: dmigs pa sha khyer khrag khyer //
NK040(thi)005:841: nyams len na dga' shi skyid //
NK040(thi)005:842: lam khyer phung po gzan bskyur //
NK040(thi)005:844: de tsam bos nas ci sbyin na /
NK040(thi)005:845: e bdag cag rnams kyii sogs rgyas pa steng nam mkha' sogs /
NK040(thi)005:847: spyir 'gro drug sogs byer bsdud ni /
NK040(thi)005:848: phatah mgo brnyan can sogs nas /
NK040(thi)005:849: mi thub thub byed par bsam /
NK040(thi)005:853: khyod snang zhing srid sogs byer bsdud brgya rtsa song nas /
NK040(thi)005:854: spyir sngags phyi pa bsang bsur dang mthun pa'i dkar 'gyed /
NK040(thi)005:855: phar phyin theg pa bya dka' ba'i spyod pa dang mthun pa'i dmar 'gyed /
NK040(thi)005:856: bla med theg pa'i tshogs dang mthun pa'i khra 'gyed /
NK040(thi)005:857: sdig sgrib sbyong ba bdud rtsi 'bebs sbyong dang mthun pa'i nag 'gyed de /
NK040(thi)005:858: 'gyed chen bzhi zhes grags pa las /
NK040(thi)005:859: khra bo tshogs dngos yod pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:861: sgrib sbyong byin rlabs chu rgyun des mthus /
NK040(thi)005:862: khra 'gyed dmigs bsal byed par 'dod na /
NK040(thi)005:863: 'di yi don bsdus 'khrul zhig dbang drag rgya mtsho'i rigs drug sems can 'don /
NK040(thi)005:864: nag 'gyed logs su mi dgos so //
NK040(thi)005:865: de nas mgron la bde sdug btang len bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)005:867: bdag bde phul na tshogs rdzogs /
NK040(thi)005:868: gzhan sdug blang na don che /
NK040(thi)005:870: dmigs pa med na mthar phyin /
NK040(thi)005:872: phatah mdun gyi nam mkha'i sogs ga te'i sngags ci 'grub bazla'o //
NK040(thi)005:876: dus gsum rgyal yum dgongs don rtogs par shog /
NK040(thi)005:878: 'dir pha dam pa'i rtags bstod sogs gsol 'debs gang rung 'don gsungs pas /
NK040(thi)005:879: spyi bor pha gcig dam pa sogs pha bstod ma cig gsungs rngams pa'i nga ros rtas /
NK040(thi)005:884: spyi bor ma cig lab kyi sgron ma gsal ba'i sogs /
NK040(thi)005:885: da phrug gdung dbyangs kyis rtas ma bstod thod smyon gyi gsungs d+aa dril bcas /
NK040(thi)005:887: d+aa ki 'bum bskul 'dir 'don pa'i srol 'dus pas /
NK040(thi)005:888: spyi bo'i ma cig las sogs /
NK040(thi)005:889: kye ma yum chen sku sogs /
NK040(thi)005:890: sras bstod gnyan chung lo tsa'i gsungs /
NK040(thi)005:892: ma yum chen de yi sogs sras brgyud rnams kyi byin rlabs sogs /
NK040(thi)005:896: 'pho ba brgya yi do zla med //
NK040(thi)005:897: ku su lu yi tshogs bsags de //
NK040(thi)005:898: tshogs bsags brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:900: ston mo brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:901: phung po sha khyer khrag khyer de //
NK040(thi)005:902: rim gro brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:903: 'dug sa gnyen sa ri khrod de //
NK040(thi)005:904: dgon pa brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:905: yon bdag snang srid lha 'dre de //
NK040(thi)005:906: yon bdag brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:907: lta ba ka dag mtha' bral de //
NK040(thi)005:908: dam chos brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:909: dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul de //
NK040(thi)005:910: man ngag brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:912: gnyis pa sngags bla med ltar bskyed rdzogs bsgom bzlas kyi lag len la /
NK040(thi)005:916: yum chen sher phyin sogs res mos bya /
NK040(thi)005:917: skyabs sems lan bdun sngar ltar bya ba'am bsdu na zur gsal ltar bya /
NK040(thi)005:918: 'jig rten skyong ba kun la gtor ma 'bul ba /
NK040(thi)005:921: bgegs gtor las byang chung ba'i /
NK040(thi)005:926: spro na khros ma'i mtshams lha bskyed /
NK040(thi)005:929: rnga d+aal gang spro byed chog /
NK040(thi)005:934: bdag mdun bzhin dang me long gzugs ltar gyer tshig cig gis bskyed /
NK040(thi)005:939: spro na ma cig gsung d+aa ki 'bum bskul /
NK040(thi)005:942: dzab dmigs sngags bzlas stong tsam bzlas /
NK040(thi)005:944: rje btsun mkha' 'gro ma'i lha tshogs 'grub par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:945: dbyangs gsal yig brgya rten snying /
NK040(thi)005:946: h'u h+r+aih yon chab khrus chab sogs gzhan rnams sngags kyis mchod /
NK040(thi)005:950: ma mgon mgar gsum rnam sras gsol ka bya /
NK040(thi)005:952: gsum pa sogs 'khor nyams chags bskang ba'i thabs la tshogs rkyang pa'i dus yin na /
NK040(thi)005:953: skyabs sems yan lag bdun pa sngar ltar bya /
NK040(thi)005:954: nam mkha' sgo 'byed sngar dkar 'gyed ltar bya /
NK040(thi)005:955: stong pa chos sku'i sogs las mkhan bskyed /
NK040(thi)005:958: ro bsre bsdeb byin rlabs byas nas /
NK040(thi)005:960: tshogs mchod 'dod yon lam glus rtas /
NK040(thi)005:963: ma cig gsung mdzes ma 'bum bskul bya /
NK040(thi)005:964: tshogs phud dum bzhi byas nas rtsa gsum dang chos skyong gtor mar btab la /
NK040(thi)005:967: zhal zas tshogs kyi sogs d+aa ru'i mchod rol re bya /
NK040(thi)005:968: de nas bsgral mchod la tshogs dum bu ling+ga rak+tasa bran la /
NK040(thi)005:969: mdun du bkod d+aa rkang bcas /
NK040(thi)005:970: bskul dbyangs lce spyang 'dur glu'i rtas /
NK040(thi)005:971: ma yum chen sogs ham bskyed 'agugagasa pa gsum /
NK040(thi)005:977: phur gdab rgyas bsdus gang spro dang /
NK040(thi)005:980: gtun brdung zhal gtab rgyas bsdus gang spro /
NK040(thi)005:981: bskang ba tshogs phud kyi rjes sam /
NK040(thi)005:983: gtor gzhong ma'i rjes gsum gang bder btang chog /
NK040(thi)005:993: de nas byin 'bebs da nang ma btang na 'dir 'don /
NK040(thi)005:994: de nas brgyud bskang che ba /
NK040(thi)005:995: gnas 'og min sogs rgyas pa 'dres gshong /
NK040(thi)005:1001: skye med sogs bsdus pa'i skabs /
NK040(thi)005:1007: khyed la phyi yi sogs nas chos skyong bskang ba'i
NK040(thi)005:1008: 'phror gcod kyi srung ma'i bskang ba sbyar nas bzlog
NK040(thi)005:1009: mtha' bar mkha' 'gro'i smre bshags klong bshags res mos
NK040(thi)005:1013: stong nyid ma gsum gang spro /
NK040(thi)005:1014: gcod kyi srung ma'i bskang ba /
NK040(thi)005:1015: bshags pa bcas kyi dam tshig nyams chags rnams bshags
NK040(thi)005:1016: pas 'gal nyams 'das ral rnams gso nas bskang bya
NK040(thi)005:1017: bskang byed bshags bya bshags byed bral ba'i de kho
NK040(thi)005:1018: na nyid kyi bskang bshags brjod bral gnyug ma'i ngang
NK040(thi)005:1019: la rang babs kyi yud tsam bzhag pas /
NK040(thi)005:1020: bskal par bsags pa'i sdig sgrib skad cig la 'dag
NK040(thi)005:1021: par rgyal gsungs nges don gyi lung gi dpang por
NK040(thi)005:1028: gshed 'dul sogs gang dgos chags med gsung ltar bya /
NK040(thi)005:1029: bdun pa gtor gzhong ma ni /
NK040(thi)005:1031: tshogs bcad khams dum bur gnam phud kyi dod du bshams shing phud rgod bdud rtsi'i bran la /
NK040(thi)005:1035: rang gzhan gyi ro de sogs /
NK040(thi)005:1036: rang gi rnam par sogs las mkhan bskyed /
NK040(thi)005:1039: ka p+aa la'i che yon ni /
NK040(thi)005:1040: d+aa ki 'bum bzhad rtas d+aa dril bcas /
NK040(thi)005:1044: d+aa rkang bcas mkha' 'gro'i gad rgyang rtas /
NK040(thi)005:1049: rdo rje 'chang chen man chad sogs nas /
NK040(thi)005:1050: sarba dz+ny+aa lo ka g+ha na tsakra kha hi /
NK040(thi)005:1053: de nas drongs ba las rdor gyis thabs shes kyi rdzas /
NK040(thi)005:1054: gza' ba g.yas btung ba g.yon du thog nas /
NK040(thi)005:1057: gzigs shig mdzes ldan sogs kyis phul /
NK040(thi)005:1058: slob dpon gyis pad skor bcas /
NK040(thi)005:1060: blang la de'i phud bcad nas /
NK040(thi)005:1061: a gra pin+da ak+shi b+h+ya s+w+aa h+aa sa phud la dbang ba'i 'byung po la bsngosa nas /
NK040(thi)005:1062: rang mkha' 'gro ma'i nga rgyal gyis chos nyid thim
NK040(thi)005:1063: pa'i tshul ro mnyam gyi lta ba'i ngang tshim par
NK040(thi)005:1064: rol nas lhag ma rnams snod gcig tu bsags /
NK040(thi)005:1065: phud lhag dang tshogs lhag snod gcig tu bzhag nas bdud rtsi dang rak+ta bran /
NK040(thi)005:1067: 'bru gsum gyi byin gyis rlabs la /
NK040(thi)005:1068: rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas /
NK040(thi)005:1071: d+aa rkang bzhi bcas stag mo'i ngar dbyangs kyis /
NK040(thi)005:1074: las kyi mkha' las dang 'jig rten sha za shugs
NK040(thi)005:1075: 'gro la 'bul ba mkha' 'gro snying thig las byung
NK040(thi)005:1076: ba'am bsdu na / h'u h+r+aihrdo rje mkha' 'gro sogs /
NK040(thi)005:1079: de nas gtsog lhag la tshogs chang bran /
NK040(thi)005:1084: ces srang mdor phul zhing snod gnyis chus bshal la /
NK040(thi)005:1089: skabs 'dir rnal 'byor pa la dgra yod na mtshon
NK040(thi)005:1090: cha lta bu'i gdams ngag yod pas logs su gab
NK040(thi)005:1091: gsungs la / lhag ma dang srung ma'i gtor 'bul
NK040(thi)005:1092: la rang lus sha khrag mi bsre bas spyi tsam
NK040(thi)005:1093: gsungs la / la / lhag ma'i gang du /
NK040(thi)005:1094: na mo mchog gsum rtsa gsum srung ma'i bden stobs dang //
NK040(thi)005:1095: chos nyid chos can rgyu 'bras bslu med mthus //
NK040(thi)005:1096: da dgra thad du langs pa'i dam nyams pa //
NK040(thi)005:1097: dmigs pa'i yul gyur lhag gtor rten la khug /
NK040(thi)005:1100: de nas gcod kyi srung ma dmar gtor gnyis dang /
NK040(thi)005:1101: dkar gtor skyems bcas bshams nas bdud rtsi bran la /
NK040(thi)005:1103: drin chen gcod yul brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi bden pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:1104: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:1105: yi dam rdo rje rnal 'byor ma lha lnga bdud
NK040(thi)005:1106: 'dul khros ma nag mo'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas
NK040(thi)005:1107: pa'i ma gcig lab kyi sgron ma mkha' 'gro bye
NK040(thi)005:1108: ba 'bum sde bka' srung chos skyong dang bcas pa'i
NK040(thi)005:1109: bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i mthus spyir sangs rgyas bstan pa'i spyi dgra /
NK040(thi)005:1110: khyad par du rnal 'byor pa bdag gis bka' dang
NK040(thi)005:1111: dam la mi gnas pa'i 'gyu log 'phar ldang mgo
NK040(thi)005:1112: g.yog mgo skor byed pa'i gdon bgegs /
NK040(thi)005:1114: do bsngo zhing phod btsug pa'i dgra bo thams cad
NK040(thi)005:1115: kyi bla srog rnam par shes pa skad cig rang
NK040(thi)005:1116: dbang med par drag po dmar gyi gtor ma 'di
NK040(thi)005:1118: dza h'u bam hoh b+han+d+ha lcang lo can gyi nang
NK040(thi)005:1119: du dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag don snying gi ngo
NK040(thi)005:1120: bor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur /
NK040(thi)005:1123: badz+ra d+aak+ki ni sarba d+har+m+aa p+aa la sa pa ti
NK040(thi)005:1124: w+aa ra dgra bgegs kyi ma h+aa mam sa la
NK040(thi)005:1125: kh+aa hi / ma h+aa rak+ta la kha hi /
NK040(thi)005:1126: ma h+aa tsit+ta la ma h+aa ko ro tsa na
NK040(thi)005:1127: la ma h+aa ki ni ri ti la ma h+aa
NK040(thi)005:1128: ba ling+ta la kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK040(thi)005:1129: de nas mkha' 'gro khros ma 'bum bskul /
NK040(thi)005:1131: mi min gyi ye shes ma shar na sogs btang nas /
NK040(thi)005:1132: gcod kyi bka' srunga rnams la gtor ma 'bul ba mdor bsdus ni /
NK040(thi)005:1134: myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs sprul phyag drug pa //
NK040(thi)005:1135: yum chen re ma ti dang gnod sbyin bzhi //
NK040(thi)005:1136: gtsang ris dpal mgon bdun cu'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)005:1137: dam rdzas brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)005:1138: bsod nams bla mas bka' bsgos dam bzhag bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1139: rnal 'byor bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:1141: dpal ldan ma h+aa ka la a g+ho ra //
NK040(thi)005:1142: yum chen bzlog byed ma dang nor rgyun ma //
NK040(thi)005:1143: rigs bzhi d+aak+ki bdud dang d+aak+ka'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)005:1144: dur khrod bdag po yab yum keng rus gzugs //
NK040(thi)005:1145: sha za pho mo'i khrom gyis bskor ba rnams //
NK040(thi)005:1146: dam rdzas brgyan pa'i gtor pha gcig dam pa'i spyan sngar khas blangs bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1148: rdo rje phag mo'i bka' nyan mthu mo che //
NK040(thi)005:1149: ma rgyud yongs kyi las mkhan mthu mo che //
NK040(thi)005:1150: bud med spyang stag 'phar ba chibs pa gsum //
NK040(thi)005:1151: las bdag mtshan mo sgra sgrogs bcas pa yis //
NK040(thi)005:1152: dam rdzas ma cig spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1154: sham po'i gza' bdud mgo dgu gdong mo bzhi //
NK040(thi)005:1155: pha srin ma klu gza' brgyad dregs pa brgyad //
NK040(thi)005:1156: btsan rgod zangs ri 'bar ba spun bdun dang //
NK040(thi)005:1157: bstan skyong ya ma bcu gnyis bcas pa rnams //
NK040(thi)005:1158: dam rdzas ma cig lab sgron spyan sngar khas bcas bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1159: rnal 'byor bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:1160: de nas dkar gtor bran la /
NK040(thi)005:1161: b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i snod du kham las gtor
NK040(thi)005:1162: ma dkar mngar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur
NK040(thi)005:1164: sarba lo ka p+aa la i dam b+ha lim ta kha kha kh+aa hi /
NK040(thi)005:1167: zhang blon rdo rje bdud 'dul yab yum dang //
NK040(thi)005:1168: nor lha brgyad dang 'brog gnas lnga la sogs //
NK040(thi)005:1169: las bzhi'i las byed nyi khri chig stong dang //
NK040(thi)005:1170: nor lha gnod sbyin bye ba'i tshogs bcas kyi //
NK040(thi)005:1171: dam rdzas dkar gsum gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)005:1172: grwa pa mngon shes can gyi bka' bsgos ltar //
NK040(thi)005:1174: ri rab phyogs bzhi skyong mdzad rgyal chen bzhi //
NK040(thi)005:1175: gnyan chen thang lha yar lha sham po rje //
NK040(thi)005:1176: mkha' ri ming sring 'o de gung rgyal dang //
NK040(thi)005:1177: klu rgyal drag po zla skyong 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)005:1178: dam rdzas dkar gsum gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)005:1179: ma cig lab sgron spyan sngar khas blangs bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1181: sprul sku ma cig lab kyi sgron ma yis //
NK040(thi)005:1182: gangs ri gnyen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad la //
NK040(thi)005:1183: gnyan sa brgya dang rtsa brgyad bcad pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)005:1184: bka' dang dam la btags pa'i lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)005:1185: 'dir gshegs dkar gsum brgyan pa'i gtor ma bzhes //
NK040(thi)005:1186: gzhan yang gcod yul brgyud pa'i bla ma yis //
NK040(thi)005:1187: bka' dang dam la btags pa'i lha srin rnams //
NK040(thi)005:1188: dam rdzas dkar gsum gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)005:1189: gcod yul brgyud pa phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang //
NK040(thi)005:1190: bdag gi phrin las 'grub pa'i sdong grogs mdzod //
NK040(thi)005:1193: de nas chad brtan zur gsal ltar btang la /
NK040(thi)005:1195: lhag ma chad brtan gtor 'bul snod rnams kha sbub
NK040(thi)005:1196: pa'i steng rdo rje rgya gram byas pas mnan nas
NK040(thi)005:1197: / na mo grub thob gcod kyi brgyud pa yi
NK040(thi)005:1198: dam chos skyong rnams kyi bden pas gnod byed dam
NK040(thi)005:1199: / sri sgab 'dre / mi min mi ru bardzu ba /
NK040(thi)005:1200: lha min lha ru bardzu ba mgo g.yog mgo bskor byed pa /
NK040(thi)005:1201: bka' dang dam la mi gnas pa thams cad gtor gzhong ri rab 'bar ba'i 'og tu khug cig /
NK040(thi)005:1202: dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes bkug la /
NK040(thi)005:1203: b+h+yoh dbus kyi phyogs nas sogs gtor bro bya /
NK040(thi)005:1204: ma cig gis rjes chog byas pas snang srid dag /
NK040(thi)005:1206: stong pa'i ngang las pad dkar zla ba'i steng du
NK040(thi)005:1207: h+r+aihls rang nyid thugs rje chen po kha sar pa
NK040(thi)005:1208: ni dkar po g.yas mchod sbyin g.yon pad+ma dar dang
NK040(thi)005:1210: zhabs sems dpa'i dkyil krung can /
NK040(thi)005:1211: rigs bdag 'od dpag med dang bcas pa thugs kar h+r+aihl yig drug g.yas su 'khor ba las /
NK040(thi)005:1212: 'od zer bdud rtsi dang 'dod yon gyi rnam par spros lha 'dre rnams kyi sdig sgrib sdug bsngal /
NK040(thi)005:1215: nor gyi shor god rnams sos /
NK040(thi)005:1218: byams snying rje byang chub kyis sems dang ldan par bsam la ma ni brgya rtsa bgrangs /
NK040(thi)005:1220: phatah lus sha khrag mchod sbyin 'di bsngosa pas //
NK040(thi)005:1221: tshe rabs 'khor ba thogs med kyi //
NK040(thi)005:1222: bu lon 'brel thag chod gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:1223: sha 'khon sdig sgrib dag gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:1229: tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam //
NK040(thi)005:1230: mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam //
NK040(thi)005:1231: bar chad med pa'i lam sgrod nas //
NK040(thi)005:1232: ma yum chen gyi go 'phang thob par shog /
NK040(thi)005:1234: h'u h+r+aih mchod yon me tog sogs /
NK040(thi)005:1235: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni ar+g+ham sogs /
NK040(thi)005:1237: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta ma h+aa rak+ta ma h+aa ba ling+ta kha hi /
NK040(thi)005:1241: chos dbyings rnam dag skye med chos kyi yum //
NK040(thi)005:1242: 'gags med rtsa bral sems nyid don gyi yum //
NK040(thi)005:1243: mtha' dbus med pas mtha' bral stong pa'i yum //
NK040(thi)005:1244: yum chen chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)005:1245: 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)005:1246: dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)005:1247: gdod nas dag pa pad+ma'i sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)005:1248: phrin las grub pa las kyi sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)005:1249: yum chen sku lnga lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)005:1250: dang po lus sems bskyed pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)005:1251: bar du zang zin phog pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)005:1252: tha mal skye med ston pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)005:1253: ma drin mo che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)005:1255: gzhung las yig brgya bsngo bas dge rtsa dag /
NK040(thi)005:1257: 'di la rigs drug gnas sbyong dmigs pa bya ba phyag len la 'byung bas /
NK040(thi)005:1258: spyi bo'i nam mkhar ma cig brgyud pa bcas pa gsal bzhin /
NK040(thi)005:1259: rang gi spyi bor lha yi sa bon dkar po /
NK040(thi)005:1260: mgrin par lha min sa bon su dmar po /
NK040(thi)005:1261: snying khar mi yi sa bon ni ljang gu /
NK040(thi)005:1262: lte bar byol song sa bon da skya bo gsang bar yi dwags sa bon pre ser po /
NK040(thi)005:1263: rkang zhabs dmyal ba'i sa bon du nag po rnams la /
NK040(thi)005:1264: rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi 'gro drug skye ba'i bag chags thim /
NK040(thi)005:1265: rkang mthil gyi yi ge 'od du thig le yungs 'bru tsam gyur gsang bar pre pa thim /
NK040(thi)005:1266: de sran ma tsam du gyur nas lte bar da la thim /
NK040(thi)005:1267: de mthe bong tsam du gyur nas snying kar n+ri la thim /
NK040(thi)005:1268: de byil sgang tsam gyur mgrin par su la thim /
NK040(thi)005:1269: de bya chen sgong nga tsam du gyur nas spyi bor la thim /
NK040(thi)005:1270: de ma cig gi thugs kar thim /
NK040(thi)005:1271: thugs yid 'dres rang gi phung po bdud rtsir zhu
NK040(thi)005:1272: 'jig rten gang 'gro ba kun gyi 'thung bas sgrib
NK040(thi)005:1273: pa dag nas 'khor ba gnas stong /
NK040(thi)005:1274: 'gro drug sangs rgyas chos dbyings skye med kyi ngang la gnas par bsam /
NK040(thi)005:1275: thal mo sbyar te lus sbyin nang /
NK040(thi)005:1276: na mo h'u bde legs mchog gi sogs mgron kun la bshags /
NK040(thi)005:1278: ma 'byor pa dang nyams pa dang //
NK040(thi)005:1279: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
NK040(thi)005:1280: legs byas 'di la nyes byas gang //
NK040(thi)005:1281: gang phyin lus can skyabs gyur pa //
NK040(thi)005:1282: de kun mgron rigs rnams kyis bzod par gsol //
NK040(thi)005:1283: gang yang bdag cag las dang po pa'i sems can du gyur pas /
NK040(thi)005:1284: gcod yul nyams su blangs ba la /
NK040(thi)005:1285: chad pa dang lhag pa gang 'og 'khrugs pa ting nge 'dzin mi gsal ba /
NK040(thi)005:1286: mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa /
NK040(thi)005:1287: gtsang sbra ma byas pa sogs mdor na nyes pa'i
NK040(thi)005:1288: tshogs ci mchis pa thams cad bzod par mdzad du
NK040(thi)005:1290: de nas byin rlabs dngos grub bskul pa la /
NK040(thi)005:1291: dang po sngar spar ba'i rnam shes dbab pa /
NK040(thi)005:1293: spyi bor ma cig gi thugs ka nas rang dang
NK040(thi)005:1294: srung bya'i rnam shes 'od kyi gong bu'i dbus su
NK040(thi)005:1296: mdzes 'dzum gar stabs khyug khyug spyi bor tshang bug nas mar byon /
NK040(thi)005:1297: snying pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi dbus su bum sku'i rnam par bzhugs par mos /
NK040(thi)005:1298: de nas dbang bzhi len pa /
NK040(thi)005:1299: phatah ma cig brgyud pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis bdag
NK040(thi)005:1300: la dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur bar mdzad du gsol
NK040(thi)005:1302: ma cig sku gsung thugs las 'od zer kha dog
NK040(thi)005:1303: sna tshogs pa 'phros mdun gyi mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i
NK040(thi)005:1304: thugs brgyud bskul / sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs
NK040(thi)005:1305: dngos grub thams cad 'od zer gyi rnam par tshur
NK040(thi)005:1306: thugs brgyud bskul / 'dus / spyi bor brgyud pa'i lha tshogs la thim /
NK040(thi)005:1307: de rnams kyis 'od du zhu nas ma cig kha
NK040(thi)005:1308: dog lnga lngar gyur nas bdag gi gnas lngar thim
NK040(thi)005:1309: pas dug lnga gnas 'gyur sku ye shes lnga mngon
NK040(thi)005:1311: 'bum bskul byin rlab chu rgyun glang lung pa'i gsung /
NK040(thi)005:1313: phata phata phata phata phata phata phata /
NK040(thi)005:1314: kye ma mi min ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)005:1318: ma cig rigs lnga sku gar stabs shig shig /
NK040(thi)005:1320: 'od zer 'ja' mtshon gyi rnam par rang dang srung
NK040(thi)005:1321: bya'i gnas lngar thim pas dbyer med chos kyi skur
NK040(thi)005:1324: ces brjod bral mi rtog pa'i ngang la yun ring du bzhag go //
NK040(thi)005:1325: de nas bsngo ba rgyas par zab don thugs snying las /
NK040(thi)005:1326: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK040(thi)005:1327: sems dpa' grub thob gcod yul rgyud pa'i bla ma
NK040(thi)005:1328: thams cad bdag dang srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad
NK040(thi)005:1330: lha 'dre khyed rnams kyi dang po bdag la cho
NK040(thi)005:1331: 'phrul gdug rtsub bstan cing gnod pa bskyal ba dang
NK040(thi)005:1332: / phyi nas gus par 'dud cing phan pa btag pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:1333: bdag gis kyang khyed rnams la spyod lam 'jam pos lus kyi sbyin par btang ba dang /
NK040(thi)005:1334: spyod lam rtsub mos gnod pa bskyal ba la sogs
NK040(thi)005:1335: pa thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas lha 'dre byang
NK040(thi)005:1336: chub kyi lam la bkod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK040(thi)005:1337: brten nas / lha 'dre khyed rnams kyi rgyud la
NK040(thi)005:1338: yod pa'i bsam sbyor nyon mongs pa'i gdug rtsub thams
NK040(thi)005:1339: cad zhi nas byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems
NK040(thi)005:1341: khyed rnams kyang rgyal po byams pa'i stobs dang /
NK040(thi)005:1342: gnod sbyin sha za spun lnga bzhin du bdag gi 'khor gyis 'dus pa dang por gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:1343: khyed rnams kyi las ngan gyi sgrib pa bag chags
NK040(thi)005:1344: dang bcas pa rnams skad cig la byang shing dag
NK040(thi)005:1345: nas / kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang rin po che thob par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:1346: rnal 'byor pa bdag kyang rgyal po zla 'od dang
NK040(thi)005:1347: rgyal bu dge don bzhin du pha rol du phyin
NK040(thi)005:1348: pa thams cad myur du rdzogs nas rang gzhan thams
NK040(thi)005:1349: cad don gnyis ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang
NK040(thi)005:1350: rin po che myur du thob par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)005:1355: bdag gzhan sogs bsngo smon bya /
NK040(thi)005:1356: mdun gyi ye shes pa rten yod na rten bazhugs pa dang /
NK040(thi)005:1358: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:1359: mgron gzhan rnams dga' ya le 'dzum shig ge mgron po rang khyim song ba ltar gshegs par bsam /
NK040(thi)005:1362: sa blar 'khod pa gang yin pa //
NK040(thi)005:1363: mgu bar gyis la rang gnas su //
NK040(thi)005:1364: thams cad tha dad 'gro bar gyis //
NK040(thi)005:1367: snod bcud thams cad gzhal yas khang la bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:1368: gzhal yas khang gi lha tshogs thams cad bdag nyid gtso bo la bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:1369: bdag kyang gdan nas 'od du zhu nas thugs ka'i sngags phreng h'u la bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:1370: h'u mtha' nas thig ler bsdu /
NK040(thi)005:1371: thig le de dmigs med spros bral chen po'i ngang la bzhag ste /
NK040(thi)005:1374: rang sems 'gyu ba dngos med kyi cho 'phrul las //
NK040(thi)005:1375: 'di las gzhan pa'i 'dre bgegs logs su med //
NK040(thi)005:1376: nga dang khyod med gnod bya gnod byed med //
NK040(thi)005:1377: lha 'dre gnyis med 'jig dang 'jigs yul med //
NK040(thi)005:1378: bzang ngan gnyis bde dang sdug bsngal med //
NK040(thi)005:1379: 'khor 'das gnyis med re dang dogs pa med //
NK040(thi)005:1380: thams cad ro snyoms chos sku yum chen thim /
NK040(thi)005:1381: ces yengs med 'dzin med ka dag rgya yan blo 'das kyi ngang /
NK040(thi)005:1383: sems la rtogs pa med pas rtogs pa'i 'bras bu chos sku thob ste /
NK040(thi)005:1385: ngag sgra la rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'bras bu longs sku thob ste /
NK040(thi)005:1386: phatah lus 'dzin pa med de gzhan don nus pa 'bras bu sprul sku thob ste /
NK040(thi)005:1389: lta ba ka dag mtha' bral de //
NK040(thi)005:1390: dam chos brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:1391: dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul 'di //
NK040(thi)005:1392: man ngag brgya yi do zla min //
NK040(thi)005:1394: de nas phatahbarjoda pa'i rkyen gyis /
NK040(thi)005:1395: rang nyid mkha' 'gro ma rgyan med gcer bu gnas gsum 'bru gsum gyis mtshan pa'i skur ldang /
NK040(thi)005:1397: de nas rgyal dang de sras lha dang drang srong
NK040(thi)005:1398: kun gyi shis pa'i bden tshig brjod bzhin me tog
NK040(thi)005:1399: gi char dbab pas kyang dge legs byas par mos
NK040(thi)005:1400: nas / bkra shis khros ma'i bzhad gdang gis //
NK040(thi)005:1401: bcom ldan sh+aakya thub pa sogs bkra shis ci rigs bya'o //
NK040(thi)005:1403: gu ru rin po che'i bog 'don gcod khrid las /
NK040(thi)005:1406: gnyis chos kyi mtshan ma grol /
NK040(thi)005:1410: gnas lugs rtogs nas bog 'don pas /
NK040(thi)005:1411: lo gcig stan thog sgom pa bas /
NK040(thi)005:1412: gnyan sar snyem thag zhag gcig bcad pas bog che zhes gsungs /
NK040(thi)005:1413: dkon mchog mnyes pas dngos grub kyi rgyun ring /
NK040(thi)005:1414: lus kyi gces 'dzin thang bas phyi nang gi bar chad zhi /
NK040(thi)005:1415: bla ma yi dam mnyes pas dam tshig nyams chag bskong /
NK040(thi)005:1416: mkha' 'gro chos skyong mnyes pas phyi nang bar chad srung /
NK040(thi)005:1417: lan chags bu lon 'khor bas las kyi sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)005:1418: bdag 'dzin blos thang bas snang srid dbang du 'du /
NK040(thi)005:1419: lha 'dre sdong grogs byed pas shin tu zab gsungs /
NK040(thi)005:1421: a za ma yi bu khyod ston //
NK040(thi)005:1422: nad pa 'dre la gtad pa na //
NK040(thi)005:1423: nad med bde ba thob pa yin //
NK040(thi)005:1424: bcol ma dgra la byed pa na //
NK040(thi)005:1425: 'jigs med btsan sar thob pa yin //
NK040(thi)005:1426: mi mthun grogs su khyer ba de //
NK040(thi)005:1427: a ma jo mos bzhad pa yin //
NK040(thi)005:1428: srungs shig skyobs shig brgya bas kyang //
NK040(thi)005:1429: zo zhig khyer cig gcig gis dga' //
NK040(thi)005:1430: lus srog gzan du bor ba na //
NK040(thi)005:1431: srung 'khor btags du med pa yin //
NK040(thi)005:1433: ma cig gi gter gcod las //
NK040(thi)005:1434: nang rig pa 'khrul gyis gdams pa 'di //
NK040(thi)005:1435: shes sam thos pa tsam gyis kyang //
NK040(thi)005:1436: rigs ldan rgyal ba'i zhing du skye //
NK040(thi)005:1437: go zhing rtogs par gyur pa na //
NK040(thi)005:1438: rkang gnyis gtso bo dngos su 'gyur //
NK040(thi)005:1439: gol sa bkag nas nyams blangs na //
NK040(thi)005:1440: bla med byang chub lag 'chang yin //
NK040(thi)005:1441: nges par klu gnyan yod pa'i sar //
NK040(thi)005:1442: chu mig brgya rtsa brten nas su //
NK040(thi)005:1443: zhag re gnyid thun re log na //
NK040(thi)005:1444: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas //
NK040(thi)005:1445: ma yis thugs dam zhal yang gzigs //
NK040(thi)005:1446: lha yi lung bstan de ru thob //
NK040(thi)005:1447: dbug dbyung pa yi gdam pa'o //
NK040(thi)005:1450: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa gcod yul mchog 'di sus 'dzin pa //
NK040(thi)005:1451: thar pa'i lam ston yon tan dpag med rgya chen 'gyur //
NK040(thi)005:1453: phyi yi gnyan sa lag len dmigs 'bul las rgya cher gsungs pas 'dir ma spros so //
NK040(thi)005:1455: thabs shes zung 'jug shin tu gces //
NK040(thi)005:1456: snang ba lam lam khyer de bas gces //
NK040(thi)005:1458: phar phyin drug dang 'brel dgos te /
NK040(thi)005:1459: lus srog la mi chags pas mchod sbyin byed pa sbyin pa /
NK040(thi)005:1460: chags sdang sogs dang ma 'dres pas tshul khrims /
NK040(thi)005:1461: sdug bsngal khyad du bsad pas bzod pa /
NK040(thi)005:1462: ma yengs rtse gcig bsam gtan rnams thabs /
NK040(thi)005:1463: brtson 'grus kyi thabs shes gnyis kyi grogs /
NK040(thi)005:1464: shes rab ni mchod rgyu mchod mkhan mchod yul thams
NK040(thi)005:1465: cad sgyu ma lta bu las rang bzhin ma grub
NK040(thi)005:1466: par shes par 'khod 'das la re dogs gcod pa
NK040(thi)005:1467: yin no // spyod lam rnam bzhi'i chings la /
NK040(thi)005:1468: nyal ba'i tshe phatahranga gi sngags mgor ma cig skyil
NK040(thi)005:1469: krung mdzad pa'i pang thog tu rang gi mgo sngas
NK040(thi)005:1470: par bsam / phatahkyi rnam shes ma cig thugs kar bstim /
NK040(thi)005:1472: phatahkyi de'i dbu gtsug nas sh+aakya thub pa sangs rgyas
NK040(thi)005:1473: stong rtsa gnyis kyi bskor nas gnas gdon lus gdon
NK040(thi)005:1474: sogs lha 'dre la chos 'chad par bsgom /
NK040(thi)005:1475: de steng lha tshogs kyi ching ngo //
NK040(thi)005:1476: phatahkyi rang gi ro che ba blos tshad gcig gyur /
NK040(thi)005:1477: de bar lus kyi ching ngo //
NK040(thi)005:1478: phatahkyisa zhabs lcags khang nang gnas gdon lus gdon sogs /
NK040(thi)005:1479: sa de'i lha 'dre thams cad tshud nas gar yang 'gro dbang med par sgom /
NK040(thi)005:1480: de ni 'og gdon gyi ching ngo //
NK040(thi)005:1481: 'gro ba'i tshe phatahkyisa rnam shes ma yi thugs kar spang /
NK040(thi)005:1482: phatahkyisa rang ro 'gyel ba lha 'dres ha thob byed par sgom /
NK040(thi)005:1483: yang 'gro dus phatahkyisa mal sa sh+aakya thub pa bzhugs
NK040(thi)005:1484: nas lha 'drer chos gsung bar mos tshur pheb dzahmh'u
NK040(thi)005:1485: bam ho sa shaka thub rang la thim par bsam
NK040(thi)005:1486: / de gnas srung 'gro ba'i ching ngo //
NK040(thi)005:1487: rgyun du spyi bor bla ma cig sgom rnam shes
NK040(thi)005:1488: bsre phung po lha 'drer 'gyed pa 'di gal che
NK040(thi)005:1489: / gcod pa ci ltar zhan kyang 'pho ba 'debs mi dgos gsungs so //
NK040(thi)005:1491: rgyal bas legs gsungs zab cing rgya che mdo sngags chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong yod mod kyang //
NK040(thi)005:1492: gangs ri seng+ge nam mkha' rnga sgra dngos grub chu mig rta bzang spu mtshungs 'dra dpe drug /
NK040(thi)005:1493: 'pho ba tshogs bsags ston mo rim gro dgon pa yon bdag dam chos man ngag zla med brgyad //
NK040(thi)005:1494: stong nyid snying rje tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs srid zhi gnyis spang sku gnyis gdan thog gcig byed rmad //
NK040(thi)005:1495: mdo lugs sngags lugs zungs 'jug rnam grangs zhe gnyis zhe gnyis pod grangs mchis //
NK040(thi)005:1496: bka' ma gter ma rgya gcod bod gcod pho gcod mo gcod gnyis gnyis dang //
NK040(thi)005:1497: pha brgyud ma brgyud sras brgyud slob brgyud don brgyud khrid can khrid med rnams //
NK040(thi)005:1498: chu brgya zam pa gcig 'og 'dzud ltar man ngag bslob brgyud 'di 'dra med //
NK040(thi)005:1499: rin chen brgya rtsa lhan cig bzhus nas lugs su blugs pa'i mchod sdong bzhin //
NK040(thi)005:1500: mthong bas yid 'phrog thos pas sems gdung myong bas re bkang gzhung bzang la //
NK040(thi)005:1501: gsal byed rin chen lde'u mig gsar pas ji bzhin 'byed pa'i legs byas gang //
NK040(thi)005:1502: gangs ri dung dang pad rtsa ltar dkar 'gro rnams byang chub thob phyir bsngo //
NK040(thi)005:1503: nam mkha'i mtha' dang rgya mtsho'i gting bzhin byis blos dpogs par mi nus kyang //
NK040(thi)005:1504: nyi tshe'i bro gros ku sha'i rtser blangs thig pa'i zeg ma phra ba yis //
NK040(thi)005:1505: gzhan gyi dri ma bkru bar mi nus rang ngor nag nog gsal byed 'di //
NK040(thi)005:1506: bla ma mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad mi 'byung dngos grub mchog gi dga' ston shog /
NK040(thi)005:1507: ces pa 'di yi smin grol gyi brgyud pa kahthoga gdan rabs nas /
NK040(thi)005:1508: sprang po bla ma kun bzang 'gyur med nas kahsi pan+di ta chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mdun dang /
NK040(thi)005:1509: 'khrul zhig nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i lung bstan pa'i gcod kyi grub thob mi drug nas brgyud pa /
NK040(thi)005:1511: rgyal sras 'gyur med rdo rje bcas kyi mdun nas /
NK040(thi)005:1512: skyabs mgon rin po che thub bstan pad+ma dgyes pa
NK040(thi)005:1513: gzhan phan chos kyi 'od zer mi 'gyur mchog grub
NK040(thi)005:1514: rtsal gyis lan gsum gsan shing /
NK040(thi)005:1515: phyis dam tshig chags nyams la gzon dbang ma gsung
NK040(thi)005:1516: pa lo bcu phrag brgal tsam gyur rung dgyes pa
NK040(thi)005:1517: chen pos smin dbang rgyas pa khrid lung bcas dpe
NK040(thi)005:1518: phyag khar gang bzhugs thob cing /
NK040(thi)005:1519: rjes su bstan mkhas yon tan rgya mtsho'i za ma
NK040(thi)005:1520: tog mkhan rgyal mtshan 'od zer mdun nas 'phros rnams
NK040(thi)005:1521: mkhan chen rin po che legs bshad 'byor ldan mdun
NK040(thi)005:1522: nas gsan pa ltar thob cing /
NK040(thi)005:1523: phyis 'di yi lag len gyi 'grigs rim bltas na
NK040(thi)005:1524: shes pa zhig bris zhes chos spyan mkhyen pa'i mig
NK040(thi)005:1525: ldan d+harma sh+r+ais bskul ba dang /
NK040(thi)005:1526: de'i sngon zhig na spang ljang nyams dga' bar brag
NK040(thi)005:1527: dkar rtse mtho dgung la reg pa khyon che ba'i
NK040(thi)005:1528: rtse kun ral gri dang kha tram lta bur yod
NK040(thi)005:1529: pa'i rtser g.ya' dag pa'i nam mkhar 'od lnga'i zlum
NK040(thi)005:1530: bskor gyi dkyil / sprin dkar la dbyibs su dod
NK040(thi)005:1531: 'dra'i phag mo dkar mo gri thod can phyi nang
NK040(thi)005:1532: cher mi sgrib pa zhig rmi lam na mjal ba
NK040(thi)005:1533: bskor gyi dkyil / dang / phyis 'dis gcod tshogs brgya rtsa zhag nyer lnga tsam la btang /
NK040(thi)005:1534: zin tho 'bri rung min gyi gsol ba btab nas rmi lam btags pas /
NK040(thi)005:1535: de nub gu ru'i kha t+w+aam yin zer ba khams
NK040(thi)005:1536: pa'i sgrub chen gyi gu ru'i sku sob na yod
NK040(thi)005:1537: pa de dang 'dra snyams la gser gyi ljib byug
NK040(thi)005:1538: can / dar sna lnga sogs sngar gyi mdzod dar
NK040(thi)005:1539: la cung bgres nyams can lag tu 'byor bas phrag
NK040(thi)005:1540: la bkal nas dogs po'i 'phrang las brgal te khyer
NK040(thi)005:1541: bas yangs pa'i khyams zhig na slebs pas /
NK040(thi)005:1542: de na dung gling 'phan yo byad thogs pa'i ser
NK040(thi)005:1543: sbreng pa kun gyi bsus song bar khyer bas kha
NK040(thi)005:1544: t+w+aam de rnga ser po yu ba can zhig gyur
NK040(thi)005:1545: / de khyer bas mi mgo skam po gser mdog can che ba /
NK040(thi)005:1546: brdung na rnga yi skad yod snyams pa zhig tu gyur pa rmis pas /
NK040(thi)005:1547: kha t+w+aam mkha' 'gro'i brda' la 'bri rung ba'i ltas bzung nas /
NK040(thi)005:1548: 'khrul pa la yang 'khrul gyi snon ma btab te
NK040(thi)005:1549: gzhan la phan 'dod kyi lhag bsam spu tsam med
NK040(thi)005:1550: rung / rang gi rgyud la sbyar tshe dpe tshol
NK040(thi)005:1551: sla ba'i phyir rig 'dzin bdul 'dul rdo rje'i gdung
NK040(thi)005:1552: brgyud du grags shing dpal rgyal ba kahthoga pa'i bka'
NK040(thi)005:1553: drin gyi zho shas thob pa'i nyag shis ba snyigs
NK040(thi)005:1555: rmongs pa ba glang so ldan khyi phag lta bu'i
NK040(thi)005:1556: gdol spyod mkhan sa man+ta b+ha dra ma tis sa
NK040(thi)005:1557: khyi zla ba gsum pa'i tshes nyer lnga la gcod
NK040(thi)005:1558: tshogs zhig btang nas bris shing brag dkar glang chen
NK040(thi)005:1559: 'dra ba'i rtser grub par byas pa /
NK040(thi)005:1560: so skye'i ma rtog log rtog gi 'khrul ba'i rab
NK040(thi)005:1561: rib bla ma mkha' 'gro chos srung gi spyan sngar
NK040(thi)005:1562: bshags pas 'di dang gtan gyi sgrib par ma gyur
NK040(thi)005:1563: cig / dge bar srid na 'gro kun bdag lta'i
NK040(thi)005:1564: 'khrul rtog gcod nas 'khrul med shes rab pha rol
NK040(thi)005:1565: tu phyin ma gdan thog gcig tu grub pa'i rgyu
